All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
Ambient Light for all the objects in the scene
Camera
class of camera helps construct rays through view plane pixels and find intersections it also implements depth of field and jagged edges improvements from part 8 as well as multi-threading and adaptive super-sampling from part 9
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Cylinder
Class Cylinder extends class Tube and represents the geometrical shape of a cylinder using height and the attributes of the parent class
DirectionalLight
class Directional Light represents directional light
Double3
This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
Geometries
Class Geometries implements intersectable and represents a list of intersectables in order to do functions on group of shapes
GeometriesTest
Unit tests for geometries.Geometries class
Geometry
Geometry is an interface for interacting with basic geometric shapes
ImageWriter
Image writer class combines accumulation of pixel color matrix and finally producing a non-optimized jpeg image from this matrix.
ImageWriterTest
Unit tests for renderer.ImageWriter class
Intersectable
Interface for Composite Design Pattern
Intersectable.GeoPoint
this is a helper class for Intersectable which saves the color of a point
Lampshade
 
LightSource
Interface Light source for managing all types of light
LightsTests
Test rendering a basic image
Main
Test program for the 1st stage Nechama Eri-Barron 328958830 nechamaeri@gmail.com Chaya Yazersky 322275876 chay7040@gmail.com the best
Material
this class describes the material of a geometry
Plane
Plane class represents a 2D plane with cartesian coordinates
Point
Class Point is the basic class representing a point of euclidean geometry in cartesian three dimensional coordinate system.
PointLight
Point light is a type of light source that is from a certain point
Polygon
Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system
Quadrangle
2D geometry representing a 4-sided shape this is a helper class in order to make the creation of scenes with four sided objects easier
Ray
class Ray used for finding intersections and other interactions between light and objects
RayTest
this test class checks the functions of ray
RayTracerBase
class RayTracerBase is the parent class to RayTracerBasic and as the basic functions for ray tracing
RayTracerBasic
class RayTracerBasic used for finding the color for pixels
ReflectionRefractionTests
Tests for reflection and transparency functionality, test for partial shadows (with transparency)
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
Scene class: PDS holder for all the data about the 3D scene: objects, ambient light, colors, etc this will be used by the renderer
Scene.SceneBuilder
scene builder is the helper class in order to implement the builder pattern
ShadowTests
Testing basic shadows
Sphere
class Sphere holds the information and functions used for a sphere
Spotlight
class Spotlight is a type of PointLight
TeapotTest
Test rendering an image
testCameraRayIntersectionsIntegration
test method for constructRay function
Triangle
class of triangle
Tube
Class Tube represents an infinite cylinder using a vector axis and a radius
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g.
Vector
Clas Vector represents a three dimensional vector.
